# paramlink2

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of **paramlink2** is to perform parametric linkage analysis in medical pedigrees.

## Installation

You can install the development version of **paramlink2** from GitHub with:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools") # install devtools if needed
devtools::install_github("magnusdv/paramlink2")
```
